Paradise Nursery Shopping Application

This project is ready for GitHub submission. All required files are present:
- README.md
- src/AboutUs.jsx
- src/App.css
- src/App.jsx
- src/CartSlice.jsx
- src/ProductList.jsx
- src/CartItem.jsx
- src/index.jsx
- src/index.html

To run the project:
1. Install dependencies: `npm install`
2. Start the development server: `npm start`

To submit, push this repository to GitHub and use the following URLs for each file:
- README.md: <your-repo-url>/blob/main/README.md
- AboutUs.jsx: <your-repo-url>/blob/main/src/AboutUs.jsx
- App.css: <your-repo-url>/blob/main/src/App.css
- App.jsx: <your-repo-url>/blob/main/src/App.jsx
- CartSlice.jsx: <your-repo-url>/blob/main/src/CartSlice.jsx
- ProductList.jsx: <your-repo-url>/blob/main/src/ProductList.jsx
- CartItem.jsx: <your-repo-url>/blob/main/src/CartItem.jsx

Replace <your-repo-url> with your actual GitHub repository URL after pushing.
